short_summary: For construction of a Airport runway:
description: Complete the rehabilitation of publically-owned Sept-iles airport runway.
full_summary:
===============

## Title and Summary
--------------

### **Title**

EF997-241966 - RFP: Temporary Runway Rehabilitation at Sept-Îles Airport

### **Summary**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Transport Canada, is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the completion of a temporary runway rehabilitation project at Sept-Îles Airport.

## Contract Details
--------------------

*   **Reference Number**: WS4508614402-Doc4508674392
*   **Publication Date**: 2024-03-27
*   **Closing Date**: 2024-04-25T14:00:00 (Expired)
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-05-01
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-08-31

## Procurement Information
-------------------------

*   **Solicitation Number**: WS4508614402
*   **Amendment Number**: 6 (Released on 2024-04-23)
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (DDP in French)
*   **Procurement Category**: CNST
*   **Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas in French)

## Location and Contact
-----------------------

*   **Location**: Quebec (except National Capital Region)
*   **Contact Person**: Jessie Jutras (SPAC/PSPC), email: [jessie.jutras@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jessie.jutras@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Other Details
-----------------

*   **Notice URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19235460?extsite=MTkyMzU0NjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19235460?extsite=MTkyMzU0NjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
*   **UNSpsc**: Airport Runway Construction Service
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Language**: French and English

You can find the complete solicitation document and more information about this RFQ on the provided notice URL above.
